text:
Day 10 of social distancing.

Feels like it's been weeks since I've talked to another person. I cringe when I hear my upstairs neighbors. I find myself wishing my cat could speak.

Remember when we used to go to coffee shops and play board games? Pepperidge Farm remembers.
